FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn command displays the VPN target list of BGP VPWS.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the export VPN target list.
-

Displays the import VPN target list.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the VPN target list after configuring BGP VPWS, run the display mpls l2vpn (route-target-list) command.
If a BGP VPWS connection between two PEs is Up but the corresponding CEs cannot communicate, you can run the display mpls l2vpn { export-route-target-list | import-route-target-list } command to check whether VPN targets are configured correctly for the L2VPN instance on the local and remote PEs.
The export VPN targets on the local PE must match the import VPN targets on the remote PE.The import VPN targets on the local PE must match the export VPN targets on the remote PE.

Prerequisites
BGP VPWS has been configured.
